timeline.bodyText:
Should the first parameter be in a separate line?
nit: add -> adds, similarly in other places. It reads a bit strange otherwise. But I do not think it is a big problem.
timeline.author: curcur
curcur

timeline.message:
[FLINK-17780][checkpointing] Add task name to log statements of ChannelStateWriter.

Add task name to the executor thread and to all method of ChannelStateWriter (as they can be called from any other thread), such that log statements can be connected to the respective task.
